name: Sea Fighter - Fish Fighting Championship
description:
Become the Sea Fighter Champion! in the FFC - Fish Fight Championships. Play Ghost-stingray, Turbo-betafish, Ninja-betafish, Tiger-betafish, Storm-betafish, Pegasus-Sea horse, Tsunami the octopus and hosted by 4 beautiful female Mermaids / round girls.    NEW 2 multiplayer now included in game. Free download version with in app purchase-only if you want 2 player playing on same device.

Game Fight Rules: No biting.

To Win: Take your opponent completely of the ring by force. This is match of strength and agility. Will you be the new Sea Fighter Champion? Mermaids host the game.

More levels and scenes to come with your download supports. All updates are included with free download. Thanks for playing. Enjoy.

See more information on my games at www.davedelcastillogames.com

Stay tuned for more versions coming soon.

A lot of love was put into this game, as it's based of my 5 betta fish I have in my room that love to fight. Maybe I will post the real ninjas photos on my website so you can see the real ninja, tiger, turbo and rest. Have fun.

Fish under the sea fight in a ring to become the Sea Fighter Champion in the FFC -Fish Fight Championship. Fish of all kind from Bettas, Seahorses, Stingrays and octopuses.
